mapper.select: SELECT address, pname, price, deposit, feet, property_service_id, floor, charge, count, registration_date, description, ps_service_type FROM property_service WHERE ps_service_type = #{psServiceType} AND property_service_id = #{propertyId}

SELECT address, pname, price, deposit, feet, property_id, floor, charge, count, registration_date, description, p_service_type FROM property WHERE p_service_type = #{pServiceType} AND property_id = #{propertyId}
SELECT property_id, p_service_type, user_id, property_type_id, price, feet, pname, deposit, charge, count, registration_date, move_date, address, description, floor FROM property

SELECT property_service_id , ps_service_type , user_id , property_type_id, price, feet, pname, deposit, charge, count, registration_date, move_date, address, description, floor, private_property FROM property_service

select property_id , property_service_id , ps_service_type , p_service_type , filename , filepath from images WHERE (p_service_type=#{ServiceType} AND property_id=#{Id}) or (ps_service_type=#{ServiceType} AND property_service_id=#{Id})

SELECT property_id, property_service_id, filename, filepath, p_service_type, ps_service_type FROM ( SELECT property_id, property_service_id, filename, filepath, p_service_type, ps_service_type, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY property_service_id ORDER BY image_id) as img_sequence FROM images ) AS img WHERE img.img_sequence = 1 and property_service_id=#{id1} and ps_service_type=#{id2}
SELECT confirm_id, confirm_check, ps_service_type, property_service_id FROM confirm
